mapper.select: select id, order_id, uid, name, phone, id_card, operate_uid, operate_name, pay_amount, alipay_amount, type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_free_deposit_alipay_history where id = #{id}

select id, order_id, uid, name, phone, id_card, operate_uid, operate_name, pay_amount, alipay_amount, type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_free_deposit_alipay_history limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_free_deposit_alipay_history(order_id, uid, name, phone, id_card, operate_uid, operate_name, pay_amount, alipay_amount, type, create_time, update_time, tenant_id) values (#{orderId}, #{uid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{operateUid}, #{operateName}, #{payAmount}, #{alipayAmount}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId})
mapper.update:
update t_free_deposit_alipay_history
order_id = #{orderId},
uid = #{uid},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
id_card = #{idCard},
operate_uid = #{operateUid},
operate_name = #{operateName},
pay_amount = #{payAmount},
alipay_amount = #{alipayAmount},
type = #{type},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
